job_title: Co-op - Station Services - Electrical Engineering Technology (301)
job_description: Your job duties may include:- travel to various stations and collect fault data- organize fault data and submit for analysis- gain understanding of overall power system operation- organize and catalog test equipment, calibration records, documentation- assist field staff in troubleshooting system problems- accessing various electronic and electromechanical protection relays and equipment,often using a laptop computer.This job will provide you with the following professional development:- apply knowledge from school to real applications- gain understanding of the power system and components- gain insight into the field of protection and control- gain field experience as a engineering technologist trainee- gain knowledge in communications with electronic devices
